title: Previous Versioning Checks - Build Version Upgrade
custom_preconds:
Have Retail version (App Store) present on the Device 
Push Updated code (version in-test / QA/PROD Ad-Hoc) to device, overwrite device application
custom_steps:
Have Retail Store version placed on device
THEN connect device via USB-C and run XCode and/or TestFlight client with updated application code set
THEN push updated code (version in-test) to device while previous app is CLOSED
custom_expected: Updated code (version in-test) should populate and over-write the previous code set from the Retail Store

Home

Volume

Menu
User returned to video detail page

Home

title: Verifying Backend receipt of Registration
custom_preconds:
tvOS device not logged in to any Apple accounts.
QA IAP Enabled build with QA Endpoints
custom_steps:
1) Start with a tvOS device not logged into any apple accounts. 
2) Fresh install of HBO QA AdHoc build also not logged in.
3)Launch app and select "Start Free Trial".
4) Follow IAP flow to completion. Provide a valid e-mail address to link HBO Account to. 
**Do not use the IAP e-mail address, as you will not be able to verify receipt of the registration e-mail.**
5) Verify account reg e-mail is received.
6) Open the registration E-mail and select the "Complete your profile" button.
7) When the registration site opens, the URL will be https://www.hbonow.com/register-profile. **Change the "www" to "qa" and refresh the site.**
8) Complete the account registration on the QA Registration site.
9) Verify video playback on device.
10)Verify with backend developers that the registered e-mail address appears in the appropriate Database.
custom_expected:
* Account registration e-mail will be received.
* User will be able to initiate video playback on device when logged into the new account.
* Backend devs will verify the registration e-mail appears in the appropriate Database
